reviews.review: Best puzzle game ever. We need more.
great... do i need to say anything else?
Amazing gameplay, great storyline and lovable characters! Even doing my project and dissertation on this game for final year of university, it was so good!
Mano um dos melhores jogos que já vi!!! uma continuação digna
Игра очень крутая, если нравится головоломки, эта игра для тебя

one of, if not the best game on steam. amazing gameplay, even better story, immersive gameplay, a unique mechanic. the only bad thing i can say about it is some advice. DON'T LOOK UP VIDEOS OF PORTAL 2 ON YOUTUBE. you'll inevitably come across a spoiler in the form of a thumbnail or title. other than that, i cannot recommend this game enough.
ТОП ИГРА ВСЕМ СОВЕТУЮ, НО СЛОЖНО)
I was bad at this game, Story was badass though.

coole gechaniken und sehr kreativ und vordernd aber in einem maße dass man nicht gtriggert ist man bängt nie zu lange an einem Raum oder rätsel 
im vergleich zu anderen games die man deinstalliert weils nicht weitergeht war das das richtige maß an knobeln und weiterkommen 
ich hätte auch nicht gedacht das hinter einem solchen game eine so gute, tiefgründige aber auch traurige story steckt 
es bleiben aber noch fragen zu Glados herkunft und carolines persönlichkeit das würde ich liebend gerne in einem 3. teil sehen. 5.Sterne von mir

Баннихоп - это действительно очень крутая штука, которая есть в csgo. С помощью баннихопа можно делать невероятно крутые мувы, делать просто восхитительные фраги и это действительно круто, когда ты умеешь баннихопить, то ты испытываешь какое-то очень приятное чувство, что ты умеешь что-то больше в этой игре, чем другие и это очень, очень прикольно
非常好玩，可以和朋友开黑一起玩
why haven't you played this game yet?

portal 2 me encanta para mi es un juego perfecto buen humor muy buen coop el juego sigue vivo obviamente no tanto como cuando salio pero la comunidad siguen sacando niveles muy buena historia en coop y preciosa en normal no es solo un remake del 1 es mucho mas y esperare muy ansioso el portal 3 para mi de los juegos mas originales que existen es mas facil que el 1 pero sigue siendo bastante dificil lo mejor es cuando te pasas los niveles con un amigo en cooperativo 10/10
its like portal but with MORE STORY, COOL MECHANICS and more. very nostalgic game to me and its very funny i love that silly little british robot wheatly
One of, if not the best game I have ever played.
Jogo bão, recomendo, puzzles são ótimos, historia é boa, mechanica de gameplay muito boa e criativa

One of the greatest games of all time definitely the best on steam.
this is amazing. it pulls you in straight away with a great opening scene and just gets better as the game progresses. everyone needs to play this at least once
One of the best games of all time, certainly Valve's finest. A must play for any gamer!
Bardzo dobra gra logiczna. Wymaga myślenia i może sprawić problemy przy niektórych poziomach. Świetny tryb kooperacji

I finally got round to playing this game, and I can definitely say this game is worth playing.
Honnêtement le jeu a une super histoire et je recommande ce jeu au fan de sci-fi ou alors fan de robotique :D

What is there to say.
Portal was an amazing, groundbreaking and beautiful game when it came out. Portal 2 is much more polished, and has an actual story. If you've never played either game you owe it to yourself to give them a go.
PORTAL 2 GLADOS GETS THE POWER OF THE ALL MIGHTY POTATO YAAAAASASSSSSSSSSSAAAASSSSS
Jogo top demais para jogar com amigos
I sucked at the puzzles, vibed at the music and cried at the ending.

Portal 1 e göre muhteşem geliştirilmiş bir oyun yeni özellikler ve ekstradan bir önceki gibi iki saate bitmiyor.

Gerçekten beyni zorlarken eğlendiğim tek oyun ve bir o kadar da eğlenceli hatta bazen tebessüm bile ediyorum. Mutlaka herkesin oynaması gereken bir oyun

It's Portal 2, what do you want me to say? It's a great puzzle game but maybe not as focused as the first one. Either way it's still a great time and I recommend it to anyone who enjoys some fairly difficult puzzles. (Just don't use a walk-through if you get stuck, it sort of defeats the purpose of the puzzle)
very good game, the storyline is the best part in my opinion but the gameplay itself is incredible absolutely worth $10
parabens pro modelador e para o scripter fizeram um grande trabalho
A literal masterpiece. if you haven't played it, play it. If you have played it, play it again. Literally the Mona Lisa of games. Play it now.
